messages.pending: Your staff application is now pending for approval.
messages.accepted: You've met the requirements and congratulations on your staff position!
messages.denied: You did not met the requirements or unsuitable for the staff position, please try again in 3 months i guess.
messages.ongoing: Your staff application interview is now on going in {CHANNEL}

questions: What is your IGN (in game name)?
What sub-server do you wish to apply for? eg. Skyblock, Prison
How long have you played on the network?
Have you been muted/banned in the last 30 days?
How much can you play weekly? eg. 5hr/10h/15h
Why do you want to become a staff member? (What motivated you to apply)
what will u do if a senior staff misbehave in front of u?
In which way can you contribute to the staff team?
Anything else you would like to add?

messages.pending: Your Ban Appeal is now pending for approval.
messages.accepted: You've met the requirements and congratulations you are now unbanned!
messages.denied: You did not met the requirements or not worthy for an appeal, please try again in 3 months i guess
messages.ongoing: Your Ban Appeal interview is now on going in {CHANNEL}

questions: What is your IGN (in game name)?
On which gamemode did you get banned on and for what
Why should we consider your appeal?
Do you believe this was a mistake? (If so reply with why otherwise type 'No')
Anything else we should be aware of?
